items.title: 2nd Birthday Skin Pack
items.description: Minecraft is growing up, time to celebrate together our 2nd Birthday!

items.title: 2nd Birthday Skin Pack - 2015
items.description:
Minecraft is growing up, time to celebrate together our 2nd Birthday!
Only available for Minecraft on PlayStation 4 (2019).

items.title: Legacy Skin Pack
items.description: Get cracking with these starter skins and old favorites brought over from Minecraft editions of yore. Widen your wardrobe, turn out in a tux, or rock it as a croc!

items.title: LittleBigPlanetโข Mash-up
items.description:
Mix the crazy, non-stop creativity of LittleBigPlanetโข into the endless fun and freedom of Minecraft with this special mashup pack.
Sackboyยฎ, Sackgirlยฎ, OddSock, Toggle and Swoop will decorate your Minecraft universe with a whole heap of LBP characters, creatures and stuff.
Only available for Minecraft on PlayStationยฎ4.

items.title: Marvel Avengers Skin Pack
items.description: Step into Minecraft dressed as one of Earthโs Mightiest Heroes (or powerful villains) with this incredible Skin Pack, featuring core team members from Marvelโs Avengers including Iron Man, Captain America, Hulk, Thor, and many more iconic characters from the Marvel Universe.

items.title: Marvel Guardians of the Galaxy Skin Pack
items.description: Join Marvelโs Guardians of the Galaxy in the most cosmic Marvel skin pack for for Minecraft yet! Star-Lord, Gamora, Rocket, Groot and Drax are only part of the pack of 24 skins inspired both by Marvelโs blockbuster film and the comic books.

items.title: Marvel Spider-Man Skin Pack
items.description: Look out! Here comes the Spider-Man Skin Pack! Featuring an assortment of 35 friends and foes straight from the saga of your favorite Wall-Crawler, this pack is sure to amaze. Catch it now!

items.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
items.description: Assemble your Mighty Morphin Power Rangers team and Go Go!

items.title: Mumbo Jumbo & Grian Skins
items.description: Private skin pack containing Mumbo Jumboโs and Grianโs skins for use in their Minecraft Earth road trip video series, debuting at Minecon Live 2020.

items.title: Stranger Things Skin Pack
items.description: Something is coming, something hungry for blood. A shadow grows on the wall behind you, swallowing you in darkness. It is almost hereโฆ Boom! Stranger Things comes to Minecraft! Join Mike, Dustin, Lucas, Will, Eleven, Joyce, Hopper and many more as they survive monsters, adolescence and 80's fashion choices.

items.title: The Simpsons Skin Pack
items.description: The Simpsons as you have never seen them before; in pure, unadulterated Minecraft block-o-vision! Don't miss out this awesome pack featuring 24 characters from the series.
